import s from './ProfileInfo.module.css' import photoUser from '../../../img/user.svg' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import React from 'react'; const AvatarPhoto: React.FC = ({avatar}) => { return
} type PropsType = { avatar: string | null } export default AvatarPhoto
